entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
